resources.string:
First of all read this once! This message will not appear again. 
How this app works is simple: 
This is a prank lie detector app, it is the perfect app for pranking your friends and family.
1. Ask a question while holding the phone facing up. 
2. Cover the back camera lens to get a 'True' result or Uncover the camera lens for a 'False' Result 
3. Let your prankie put his finger on the finger print image on the screen 
That's it! The answer you selected will be displayed on the screen!
*note, by clicking on continue you will never see these instructions again.

Place your finger on the fingerprint icon for a few seconds until the app will detect if you are truthful. \nMake sure to put your whole finger on the fingerprint image in order for the app to detect your pulse correctly.
